channel.title: Help!
channel.description: I have just finished my tutorial no how to make a server. i just finished the last few steps including compiling run bat etc. my compiling worked out fine and i hit run bat and it said creating port 43594 er somethin like that.(good). i tried to log on to my server but it said connection error, server must be down(bad). btw yes i have a no-ip account and host. what do i do??!?!!?!? Plz help me

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @kdog666 kdog666
item.description:
@kdog666 wrote:

i already did all of that stuff and i made a port in my firewall with the same as my no-ip and okay check back ina bit im guna try the server check[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 13, 2009, 02:21:14 pm[/size][hr]i portforwarded but still nothing

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Make sure your no-ip redirects to your actual IP.
Make sure your client is also connecting to that IP.

Finally, to check if you actually portforwarded correctly, turn on the server and go here:
http://runelocus.com/?action=statuscheck

Check if it says online. If it does that means your client is connecting to the wrong IP, if it’s offline and the server is running, you might have done something wrong such as not opening port 43594 on your firewall etc… or not portforwarded right (instructions on portforwarding can be found here: www.portforward.com)

Read full topic
